attributes.action: Require banks to pay a fair interest rate on frozen accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My elderly mother's bank account was frozen when her bank (NatWest) decided that she was not competent to run it.

It has taken five months to resolve this situation.  In this time, despite a request from my mother to move her money to a higher rate account, the bank have only paid 0.2% on her savings compared to 2.75% that is available to other customers.

I believe that a bank should be required by law to pay the best rate of interest that is available to other customers when an account is frozen.

Thank you for your interest in this petition.
